title: HELLO ARE YOU LOOKING FOT A RELIABLE, LOCAL ELECTRICIAN?
body:
A B Electrical & Maintenance is a Midlands-based electrical and maintenance team. For over 13 years, our team has caried out a range of domestic and commercial work for individuals, landlords and businesses throught Nottinghamshire, Derbyshire and the surrounding area


Quality and attention to detail are none-negotiable in our world, as are respect, safety and trust. Our customers depend on us to do a through and compliant job, which is why we are committed to delivering the standard of service and finish we expect to see in our own homes.
